Title: ‘Raid’ on school: minorities’ commission to take action
Content: The Karnataka State Minorities’ Commission, which now has judicial powers, said on Wednesday that it would take “suitable action” with regard to the recent “raid” on a school in Bondantila near the ci
Author: Special Correspondent
